body.p: I certify that Benjamin Johnson this day personally appeared before me and Took the Oath Required by Law at Lieutenant in Regiment of Kentucky Volunteer Malitia to be mustered into the United States service Witness 3rd day of Decr 1861
D Little presiding Judge for McLean County Kentucky
D Little P J C M
